players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm the detective. Diana is mafia. Be cautious."
You: "Thanks Bob, investigating Diana made sense. Any tips on who else to check?"
Diana: "Considering Bob's info, Alice & Charlie are safe. Focus on Bob."
Bob: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob. He might have info we need."
Diana: "Alice, watch Bob closely. He might know more than he's letting on."
You: "Thanks for the tips, Bob & Diana. Checking on Charlie tonight."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob

Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.

Diana: "Considering Bob's info, Alice & Charlie are safe. Focus on Bob."
You: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob. He might have info we need."
Diana: "Alice, watch Bob closely. He might know more than he's letting on."
Alice: "Thanks for the tips, Bob & Diana. Checking on Charlie tonight."
